      • builder

        public static <T> VBANPacketHead.Factory.Builder<T> builder(VBAN.Protocol<T> protocol)
                                                     throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Creates a new Builder with the default properties pre-set for the specified protocol.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type-Variable for the stream type.
        Parameters:
        protocol - The protocol to create the Builder for.
        Returns:
        A new builder for the given protocol.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the protocol is VBAN.Protocol.SERVICE.
